commit.message: Fixed the add-dependency Forge command for the jboss-javaee-6.0 artifact

modified.diff:
@@ -217,7 +217,7 @@ By default, Forge sets up the project to use Java 1.6, the minimum recommended v
 
 What we need to add now is the Java EE APIs. That's done using the @project add-dependency@ command below:
 
-bc(command). $ project add-dependency org.jboss.spec:jboss-javaee-6.0:1.0.0.Final:pom:provided
+bc(command). $ project add-dependency org.jboss.spec:jboss-javaee-6.0:1.0.0.Final:provided:pom
 
 You'll also need to add JUnit 4.8, the minimum required version of JUnit to use Arquillian, as a test-scoped dependency:
 
@@ -246,8 +246,8 @@ bc(prettify).. <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
             <groupId>org.jboss.spec</groupId>
             <artifactId>jboss-javaee-6.0</artifactId>
             <version>1.0.0.Final</version>
-            <type>provided</type>
-            <scope>pom</scope>
+            <type>pom</type>
+            <scope>provided</scope>
         </dependency>
         <dependency>
             <groupId>junit</groupId>
